Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a point in Euclidean space.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • dimension

        public int dimension()
        Number of coordinates in point

        For example, (0,0) is dimension 2 and (0,0,0) is dimension 3

      • getCoord

        public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> getCoord()
        Returns the point as a vector of doubles

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Create a string version of a point

        For example (3, 4, 5)

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • add

        public Point add(Point other)
        Add a point to another point elementwise
        Parameters:
        other - a point with the same dimension
        Returns:
        the elementwise sum of points
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - when points are not of the same dimension

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        testing method
